sentences.en: A certain sociability degree is a specific character of most plants.
sentences.cn: 特定的群集度是多数植物特有的特征.

sentences.en: A fire of withered pine boughs added sociability to the gathering.
sentences.cn: 枯松枝生起的篝火给这次聚合增添了随和、友善的气氛.

sentences.en: Enthusiasm, adaptability, sociability, and good health are essential.
sentences.cn: 富有热情、能适应环境、善于与人交往以及身体健康都是基本的条件。

sentences.en: Extraverts tend to possess skills such as sociability, talkativeness, and a high interest in affiliation.
sentences.cn: 外向者倾向社交活跃, 爱说话,有高度兴趣加入人群.

sentences.en: Faces are a sign of sociability or lack of it.
sentences.cn: 面容(面部表情)是善于交际或缺乏交际的标志.

sentences.en: Seek harmony and sociability in everything you do and you will reach the popularity you seek.
sentences.cn: 学会处事融洽和善于社交,你就能得到追寻已久的声望.

sentences.en: Sociability is a great asset to a salesman.
sentences.cn: 善交际是推销员的一大本钱.

sentences.en: Sociability may change considerably during the course of succession.
sentences.cn: 群集度在演替过程中可能有相当地变化.

sentences.en: The folk custom of sociability facilitates the formation and development of Hanzhong cuisine.
sentences.cn: 好请客、吃请的民间饮食风俗,推动了汉中菜的形成和发展.

sentences.en: The major species of pests had stronger photokinesis and sociability.
sentences.cn: 曲虫主要种群都具有较强的趋光性和群集性.

words.tran_cn: 社交的；好交际的；友善的
和蔼可亲地；善于应酬地
参加社交活动；发生社交往来（等于socialize）
使社会化；使社会主义化
善于交际；社交性；好交际

trans.tran_cn: 好交际，社交性，善于交际
